description:
In this skill, Alexa will provide you with words and it's up to you to tell her the correct letter that the word begins with. "Cat starts with what letter?" Answer "C" and get a point.

This skill is great for teaching kids the letters of the Alphabet!!!
exampleInteractions: Alexa, Open Alphabet Flash Cards and Start a New Game
name: Alphabet Flash Cards
shortDescription: Great skill for teaching the Alphabet Letters. Alexa will ask you what letter a word begins with. Get it right and rack up the points.
